string-array.name: crashCatchDialog
string-array.item: Quick Bart is misbehaving, and our developers have been notified. If you please, write us and tell us how you got here!

resources.string:
Quick Bart is free and open-source software. All train estimates are displayed as minutes until departure.

Happy Riding

string-array.name: aboutDialog
string-array.item:
Quick BART uses the source code of Open Bart as its base to it follows their GPLv3 license. Code is available on Github https://github.com/kevingil/BART.

Need help? Email us!
fancybearstudioinc@gmail.com.

Thanks

resources.string: I\'ll vibrate when you need to move

Experimental Feature!
I can vibrate your phone when your stops are approaching! You can also check the notification bar at any time to see your next move.
